manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Model Number: A81E5 Anker 310 USB-C to USB-C Cable (3 ft Braided) Supports High-Speed Charging Power up your Samsung Galaxy S23 to 55% in just 30 minutes when you use a compatible Power Delivery USB-C charger (not included). Universal Compatibility This USB-C charger cable is USB-IF compliant for flawless compatibility with USB-C devices, ensuring a safe and reliable charge—every time. Durable Design Built to withstand up to 10,000 bends—this cable is ready to handle anything. This is a USB-C to USB-C cable, so it cannot be used with a USB-A charger. This cable does not support media display.

Compatibility Fully Compatible Devices: iPad Pro 2021/2020/2019/2018, iPad Air 4, iPad mini 6 Galaxy Note 20 Ultra/20/10+/10/9/8, Galaxy S8/ S8+/ S9/ S9+, Galaxy /S23/S22/S21/S20/S10/S10+/S10e Google Pixel 3/4/5/6, Google Nexus 6P Nintendo Switch Huawei Matebook X MacBook Pro (2020/2019/2018/2017/2016) 13.3ʺ, MacBook Air 2020/2019/2018 Compatible Devices (Limited Charging Speeds): MacBook Pro 16ʺ (2021), MacBook Pro 14ʺ (2021), MacBook Pro (2019/2018/2017/2016) 15.4ʺ, MacBook Pro 2020 16'' Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Series, HP Spectre Series, Samsung Galaxy S23+/S22+/S23 Ultra/S22 Ultra

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for my iPhone 15 Pro!
reviews.reviewText: These cords work great for my iPhone 15 Pro! It charges my phone UBER fast & they fit snugly in the charging port! The nylon cord is perfect for the car because it can bend easily without damage for passengers which is a huge plus (my kids destroys all my cords but not these ones!). As cables go, these seem really well made. The cable feels thick and durable. They also have the velcro strap for storage on trips etc! Very pleased! TIP - For the car, I had to buy a USB to USBC adapter (very inexpensive!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Performance and Durability: Anker USB C Cable
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Anker USB C to USB C Cable (3ft, 2Pack) and am thoroughly impressed with its performance. These cables support fast charging with a 60W/3A capacity, significantly reducing the time needed to charge my iPhone. The build quality is exceptional, ensuring durability and a long lifespan. They are the perfect length for everyday use, providing convenience without any clutter. Anker's reliability shines through in these cables, making them a must-have for anyone in need of efficient and fast charging solutions. Five stars for their outstanding performance and durability!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality And Value
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these USB C to USB C cables to use mostly for charging applicatoins with Apple products. The cable connectors do not have the same positive snap-in experience you get with Apple cables but do hold in securely once installed and do not wiggle around. The cable feels sturdy and flexible enough, although not as flexible as the new Apple woven cable. The woven jacket feels tough and durable. The strain relief is securely fitted around the cable jacket to help prevent breakage at this point. The cable is very well constructed overall. The included hook-and-loop cable tie is a nice extra but the outer hook surface can get caught on things, like clothing, unintentionally. These cables are an excellent value and I would purchase again if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Anker NEVER disappoints!!
reviews.reviewText: Anker is the best brand for audio/electronics if you're on a budget. No other brand gives you this great quality for such a low price. I have bought from Anker many times over the years, they have never failed me. This is no exception. Does the job, and is of solid quality. What more can I ask for?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cable braiding is annoying
reviews.reviewText: I think the cable is great, except for the braiding. The velcro cable tie, being itself of good quality, is enough to attach and pull some of the strands of the braid. My only concern is how long this would last. Otherwise, I trust Anker is generally great - after owning many of their products that have never failed me before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love Anker in this house!
reviews.reviewText: I would be lying if I said we are not constantly impressed with Anker and their quality. We have bought a few different products of theirs for years now, and all of them continue to hold up to the testament.I bought this two pack to replace my OG Samsung cord that has decided to give up the ghost and started fraying near the charge port. Of course, we went straight to looking for Anker as a replacement, because I have had great success with them with previous Samsungs. Now, we all know Samsung can be a bit finnicky when it comes to their charging habits. You have to have the OG block and the OG cord, or your phone yells at you that it "may not work effectively" or yaddayaddayadda.We got this package within the estimated time for delivery and immediately I opened it and hooked my phone up to this with the OG Samsung block. I was met with a very long sturdy cord, a velcro strip to help keep the cord tidy when not in use, and my phone happily started charging with Super Fast Charging capabilities being available. I have tested the second cord, and I saw no issues with that one, either.Anker, please keep up the great work!! Thank you so much for preventing me possibly having to buy an original cord that could cost more than your two pack!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and effective
reviews.reviewText: Anker brand is reliable and reasonably priced. You don't save much money with the rock bottom ones, so I'd rather go with one I trust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for price
reviews.reviewText: I've gotten a couple pairs of the Anker 310, and it's the best value on the market right now for a jack-of-all-trades USB-C cable. I use it to charge my bluetooth headphones, bluetooth speaker, Switch, and Chromebook. This is also the cable I bring while traveling. The braided cord is nice in that it resists getting twisted or coiled up. The 310 design head is easy to grab with a nice, tactile feel. Only downside is that the braided cord gets frayed by the velcro strap. I know the strap is a nice bonus, but I always take them off because they can ruin my bag or clothing fabrics.

Bought for both of my iPhone 15 pro max and Samsung s23 ultra. Great length, durable enough and charge fast. Only issue that my iPhone is getting hot after charging for 10mins. Not sure if that’s because of the cable or the charger head.Overall great product with great price

reviews.reviewTitle: Cables de calidad. Ideal para el cargador Anker.
reviews.reviewText: Compré el cargador Anker junto con el pack de dos cables USB C y lo he probado durante unas semanas. Un cable es para el PC y el otro para el cargador Anker que me permite cargar dos dispositivos a la vez. Tienen buena longitud y permiten enrollar un tramo con el velcro si es necesario. Después de comparar las soluciones oficiales de Google y iPhone me decidí por comprar el pack de 2 cables USB de Anker junto con el cargador que permite cargar 2 dispositivos y la verdad es que acerté completamente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You can't go wrong with Anker products, and these are well priced. The 6 feet length (1.8 metres) is great, and they charge devices very fast. Well made and durable.

Ho acquistato sempre cavi anker trovandomi mediamente veramente bene. Il problema che ho avuto è stato solo con alcune serie di cavi microusb che si auto rompevano da nuovi surriscaldandosi senza aver collegato nulla alla parte finale. Nello specifico questo cavo si sta comportando molto bene, mi consente la ricarica rapida senza alcun problema ed è di ottima fattura. Questa serie mi sento di consigliarla. Ottimo cavo e ottima anker come quasi sempre.
Me ha gustado el revestimiento del cable porque se puede doblar con facilidad y no es rígido como algunos plásticos también la conexión se realiza de una manera fácil y certera
